EmailTemplate.name: 10-26-22 Aloha Cloud In the Know Customer Comm.Aloha Cloud In the Know Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for our NCR Aloha Cloud In the Know Session
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join us on November 3, 4-5 p.m. ET, for the Aloha Cloud In the Know session. Our product experts are back to discuss the latest enhancements to Aloha Cloud, review product roadmap priorities and share more exciting details about the new Handheld for Aloha Cloud. You will also have the opportunity to help the product team prioritize the features and functions you want to see on the Aloha Cloud roadmap.
Click here to register. <[[https://ncr.webex.com/ncr/onstage/g.php?MTID=e0676873b35f0350515e3441a0898c0d3]]>
